long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pathora-AI is a Conversational AI application that help business users  build website using Wix/Wordpress without needing to learn the software. We help bridge the learning and doing gap by enabling business users.

No more watching youtube videos. No more reading through boring help and FAQ sections. No more waiting for your colleague/friend to reply.  All in one place through our chrome extension. User can interact with our chat bot to get any task done on the software (like Wix).
